name: Dice-isive Strike
description:
Roll with the punches in this martial arts dice game.

Punch and kick through waves of martial artists at your rival's dojo by deciding whether to block and survive until next  turn or go all out for the KO and progress to to the next wave.

Your choices are influenced by a pool of dice. Some rolls will have you smacking your opponents all day long, while an unlucky roll will require minimising the inevitable pain coming your way. 

Luck plays a part, but a strategic player will survive the day.

This game was made in 48 hours for GMTK jam 2022 by me, Damien Patterson.
